AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Average Child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] didn't really do much as a child, except for get into a few fights. [PAWN_pronoun] was also a little dumb.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Jack Of All Trades
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_pronoun] went through a lot as an adult, from brain surgery to homelessness to musical virtuosity to mayoral rampages on R4, founding homeworld of the Hamal Amalgamation; [PAWN_nameDef] did a lot to get here, but is most notably known as a musician.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Stargazer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: A young [PAWN_nameDef] stared at the sky too much. This started [PAWN_possessive] path to astronomy and astrophysics. Unfortunately, when [PAWN_pronoun] learned that the sun was a star, [PAWN_pronoun] stared at it too and went nearly blind.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Astrophysics professor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Over time, [PAWN_nameDef]'s passion for scientific discovery pushed [PAWN_pronoun] to write a multitude of books and other media devoted to astronomy and astrophysics. Still blind though.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Dork
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had a sad childhood because [PAWN_pronoun] never learned how to socialize without sounding like a dork until way later. Was able to kick some serious butt though, so it all evens out.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Survivor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Still struggling with a mouth fit for a dork, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to focus on a career that required no social skills whatsoever - the military.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Impressionable Youth
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: After struggling socially, [PAWN_nameDef] became enamoured with social ideaologies that most people would call "extreme".

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Terrorist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] went on to do terrible things to innocent people. [PAWN_possessive] actions resulted in the death of many, many avali through the distribution of a deadly virus.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Southern Sergal
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a hot southern region (on Vilous), dreaming of becoming a cabaret star, or sometimes just fish. (Eating them, not becoming them)

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Borderline Pornstar
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] got established as a cabaret dancer, producing holovids and live holostreams... on pornhub. Somehow, [PAWN_nameDef] ended up here. Cocaine is a hell of a drug.
